channel.title: Php Colorado Irc Kungfu on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: meanwhile
item.description: tonight.. I didn’t meant o go out. I went to get my haircut.. and ended up going out with my stylist.. severn and a lot of his friends. we went to some place called inn joy. heh. it was great. I met a lot of friends there and ended up hanging out something fierce. it was a great time. it looks like my state is gunna burn down. wtf. that is scary.
